text: Jacques Galipeau (22 September 1923 â€“ 30 August 2020) was a Canadian actor and comedian. He was born in Montreal. Galipeau was known for his roles in Beau temps, mauvais temps (1955), Les Belles Histoires des pays d'en haut (1969), The Pyx (1973), La Petite Patrie (1974), Bingo (1974), Duplessis (1977), He Shoots, He Scores (1991), Black List (1995), Set Me Free (1999) and Chaos and Desire (2002). Galipeau died on 30 August 2020, aged 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian comedians Category:Actors from Montreal
title: Jacques Galipeau
